article.class: cb-article cb-color-hover clearfix no-2 post-19042 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail category-elem-news category-high-school category-mid-school category-news

div.div: Students in 3rd-12th grades enrolled in the Epic One-on-One Program now have FREE access to live Homework Help...ANYTIME...

div.p: Homework Help is open to Epic One-on-One students in grades 3 – 12. This support is brought to you 24hrs-a-day through the end of the school year.
Before accessing Homework Help, make sure to check your email to get login instructions and see the introductory video!

p.b: Homework Help is available for English/Language Arts, Math, Science, and Social Studies courses.

div.p: By clicking on the “Login” button I am agreeing to the rules of non-disclosure and confidentiality indicated here.
PARENTS: EpiCenter is your access to your student's information. Your Username and Password were created and issued to you at the time your enrollment was approved.

center.font: Do you have a question, comment or concern? You are welcome to contact us any time or make an appointment to come by the Administrative Office.
